comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This looks like another pic of Bundaberg...with the flooded Burnett River not far below the deck of the railway bridge...also check out this pic bonzle.com/c/a?a=pic&fn=fmo76f27&s=3 ...an 1895 T&CJ item and sketch nla.gov.au/nla.news-article71219421 Given the railway bridge was built in 1890-91...I'd say this pic might have been taken during the 1893 flood... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article71010163 this 1884 T&CJ pictorial shows the Court House...looks like that's it we see in this Poulson pic...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Thanks Quasymody! Agreed - the veranda of the Courthouse in the sketch looks pretty much the same as the building in this image.
